Short, but fun games, just how I like 'em

This game is great. but it is held back by a few things. #1 is the fanbase. While a lot of people are good and friendly, most are toxic. #2 is rank system. matchmaking with your own rank is impossible apparently. and finally #3 is the bloodweb. the bloodweb works great but really sucks and takes too long to advance in.
At least the neighbor games on the google play store are free.
I'd rather play Nightcrawlers for free at my house than buy this game for 60% off.
toxic survive with friends everywhere, teabagging at the exit gate

Плюсы:игра с реальнами игроки а, не с ботами. много выживших и убийц, если ты играл за одного персонажа хорошо, то не факт что за другого будешь тащить. 
Минусы:днём катка ищется 2-3 минуты, но ночью 5-10 минут я очень много играю ночью. 

Игра:7/10
Если также будет мало народу, то через 1 год игра умрёт.

The design and the concept of this game is awesome, it's fun, but I'm giving it a thumbs down since the new animations sucks and they added nft shit. There's hackers, a toxic community, horrible devs, they won't allow you to use mods now, yet it takes 3 weeks for them to ban a dead by daylight hacker. Back then it's a 9/10, now is just a 6.5/10. I'd recommend this game but just letting you know that it isn't the same as the old dead by daylight.
simply one of the best games 10/10
打一把掉一次退出游戏进一次，现在游戏关都关不掉，反作弊也经常开不了，还常回档，游戏公司干啥，创意还是挺好，但这个画风，现在2020了，建模绝地求生都比不上，队友还是很友好。国服屠夫八分钟匹配一把，完全没人玩，人类还是挺好匹配的，总之不建议购买，放着吃灰了。

The game itself is a pretty awesome concept, However the biggest Issue I have is that there isn't a AI.
It would be great to have a practice mode concept that way you can learn how to utilize the killers and survivors instead of just jumping into a live game without really knowing what your doing.

真的是十分不错的游戏，从17年开始游玩，到20年。虽然版本经历过一次又一次更迭，但bug和不平衡仍一直伴随，有些bug都能堪称经典了，而大部分服务器问题仅国服才会出现，如果想增进游戏体验可以开加速器去外服，当然也希望官方能想办法改善国服服务器体验。
Pretty fun game to play with the guys or to solo some randos

I'm sorry for my English, it isn't my main language
A really dope game, whether you play with friends as a survivor, or alone as both killer or survivor, you'll surely have fun. Just keep in mind there are a lot of sweaty, toxic assholes playing this. 
Also, there are a lot of almost useless perks that can be replaced by some other, stronger, "meta" perks. I guess that's something that should be fixed, as variety might make the game even more fun to play, as I hate having to use the same perks over and over to have an optimal performance as both survivor or killer. Don't get me wrong, you can perform very well using whatever you want, but at higher ranks as a killer, you'll often find a lot of people using just meta perks such as DS or BT. At least killers have SOME variety to their perks. 
All killers are pretty fun to play, except for a couple that could really use a rework, such as Bubba.
Survivors on the other hand just differ from each other on appearance, all of them are the same except for the perks they come with (this is solved by leveling the bloodweb of characters up, this makes it so their perks can appear on other characters' bloodwebs), it's still pretty fun to play as a survivor, even more if you are playing with friends and not being such a scumbag, self-entitled tryhard.
Maps are also pretty cool, some you may find are survivor or killer sided, but they all have some pretty nice aesthetics and ambience, like Hawkins lab for example.
Music is just meh, this is just my opinion though.
Gameplay can get kind of repetitive really quick, you may want to try out a few different killers if you get bored of doing almost the same things as a survivor each game, this doesn't mean the game itself isn't fun, as each match is really different.
In game transactions work nicely IMO, you can get characters be it by paying real money or by spending shards that are earned by leveling up (it might take you a while though, you can buy your first character at account level 46), cosmetics are different for each survivor and killer, so you'll have a lot to choose from, you can even mix some of the cosmetics to get some nice looking results, also, there are some cosmetics that can be bought using shards too, so you can grind even more shards to buy some nice looking stuff for your characters.
One thing I hate though, is the fact that there isn't any reward for reaching high ranks, you'll get a steam achievement and that's it, I mean, you should get at least shards based on your rank at the time of the reset or something, so there's an appeal to getting to high ranks other than just bragging with your friends and stuff like that.
Overall, the game is pretty fun and will probably give you a lot of hours of gameplay, make sure to grab it now while it's on sale (though I'd buy it without it being on sale)
отличные платные дисбалансные маньяки , 10/10 . Очень сильно испорчена этим игра, против некоторых просто невозможно играть, какой бы скилл не был у маньяка, это имба

This game has big issues with balance and the connection. I was disconnected twice in 15 minutes and had to suffer the DC penalty wait-time because of it. It also claims that its not connected to a network when my wifi is running smoothly. This is the only game I have on Steam or any other provider that has such problems.

*No network connection*
*In order to access this content, a network connection is required.*

EVERY SECOND GAME. 

I'm always on Discord with friends, no connection problems whatsoever. Any other multiplayer game? No network problems. 
DBD? 
Getting disconnected + *the game was unable to update your rank* + not being able to spectate and call out things to my teammates.

+ After playing six games in a row without problems (and nothing running on my computer other than Discord and Steam), the game's anticheat suddenly decides that I'm hacking and slams a temporary ban in my face.

Other than that, pretty fun with friends.
